ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Guilds
ygData.msgSnippet: If you go to www.guildmagic.com you can find a list of guilds on your new server. luv, -Su ... but they only play on fironia Vie server, which i just left as i
ygData.messageBody:
If you go to www.guildmagic.com you can find a list of guilds on your new
server.
luv,
-Su

> Hi all
>
> I am looking to join a Guild, i was a member of the Clan Silver Wolf Guild
but they only play on fironia Vie server, which i just left as i wanted to
try a server without any of the rulesets, so i migrated to the Druzil Ro
server, but i miss the comradeship of the guild, and end up spending most of
my time on my lonsome :'( so i am looking to see if a guild will hear my
pleas and take me in.
>
> Much Desperate Pleading.
>
> Nuada
> Elf Mage
> Druzil Ro
>
>
>
